title: Packet loss since latest two patches.
body:
Hi,

Have been experiencing packet loss for a couple weeks now (ping and fps remain stable, but I'll click and my champion won't respond for a second or so, same with abilities, intermittently). I've also noticed slightly higher ping than usual fairly frequently, I have had a stable 58-60 ping for months, now suddenly I see it getting north of 70, this in itself isn't a huge issue but the packet loss is completely ruining the game for me.

Anyone able to help?

replies.body:
Thanks, have done that already and came up empty handed (Worth noting that it ONLY happens with League, other online games are not effected)  - but hadn't had the chance to run ICSI yet (until now). It's detecting 0.5% packet loss which is below the norm and perfectly acceptable. But was hoping some staff member or somebody with the know-how to read and see if there are any glaring issues with my network?


http://n1.netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/restore/id=369839a0-3974-ade86b04-1d20-49db-8cc8/rd

Could you do the following for me,

* [Switch to a public DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq5)
* [Download WinMTR](https://sourceforge.net/projects/winmtr/files/WinMTR-v092.zip/download) and run a traceroute to the following IP. (Allow this to run for 5-15 minutes)
  * 103.240.227.5
* Once adequate time has passed, stop the traceroute, export your results as text.
* Post back with a link to your WinMTR results (You can use [pastebin](http://pastebin.com/) for this)

Done, and done. (Public DNS didn't solve anything)

http://pastebin.com/96QK9mKe

I will continue in another couple hours to see if anything changes. Thoughts?

Tried two hours later (when ping is slightly elevated) 

http://pastebin.com/EgRVWVLB
There's definitely some noticeable packet loss along your route, have you tried contacting your ISP about this issue?

That would my first point of contact, but since it's ONLY happening with League (and not other games - Smite, CSGO, WoW, etc etc), I thought I would see on here if anybody has some insight for me. We are planning to call our ISP anyway over the weekend, but ISPs in Australia are notorious for dismissing everything you say, and blaming you, or the game you are playing - People on these forums tend to be much more helpful :P
No, sorry. Nothing like your issue. My ping still fluctuates, just within acceptable levels.

Hey this sounds so similar to my post, i wonder what the issue is. But this happens only once every week or more so I am not concerned, its just annoying. 
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/EAsjKYey-weird-connection-problem
Thanks for the comment, mine is happening all the time, I haven't had a lag-free/packet loss-free game in weeks now. :(
